TopicTitle: I want to make more music for KSP2

Articles.Content:
Hi all!! I'm feeling so AWE'd and inspired by my first orbital launch in KSP2 <3 Thank you to the devs and all the work that's gone into this.

I love the score that's been made for the game, at least what I've heard of it so far. I recognize that the in-game music might not be everyone's cup of tea (and may get old at some point)

So as a musician and maker of "music to think to" (see scores I've made for Veritasium on YT) I want to make an album of "Music for KSP" to accompany flights and building in the game.

Is this something you'd be into? What requests of additional genres, styles, moods, textures, and tones would y'all folk wanna build rockets to in addition to the OST?
A deep, choir-like organ symphony for only the most precarious, dangerous deep-space maneuvers!

1 hour ago, Dantheollie said:

A deep, choir-like organ symphony for only the most precarious, dangerous deep-space maneuvers! 

YES!
